song.intro: As we proceed to give you what you need Uh Get live, motherfuckers As we proceed to give you what you need Get live, motherfuckers Now turn the mics up As we proceed to give you what you need Turn that mic up Yeah, that beat is knocking, I need that mic up, though Turn that shit the fuck up East Coast, motherfuckers Uh, what? Bad Boy, motherfuckers Turn it up louder, yeah, uh As we proceed to give you what you need UhUh
song.verse: Who shot ya? Separate the weak from the obsolete Hard to creep them Brooklyn streets It's on, nigga, fuck all that bickerin' beef I can hear sweat tricklin' down your cheek Your heartbeat sound like Sasquatch feet Thunderin', shakin' the concrete Then the shit stop when I foil the plot Neighbors call the cops, said they heard mad shots Saw me in the drop, three and a quarter Slaughter, electrical tape around your daughter Old school, new school need to learn though Burn slow like blunts with yayo Peel more skins than Idaho Potato Niggas know; the lyrical molesting is taking place Fucking with B.I.G., it ain't safe I make your skin chafe, rashes on them asses Bumps and bruises, blunts and Land Cruisers Big Poppa smash fools, bash fools Niggas mad because I know that cash rules Everything around me, two Glock nines Any motherfucker whispering about mines And I'm And I'm Crooklyn's finest Crooklyn's finest You rewind this, Bad Boy's behind this Bad Boy's behind this
song.interlude: As we proceed to give you what you need What? What? Get live, motherfuckers As we proceed to give you what you need What? East Coast, motherfuckers Bad Boy, motherfuckers Uh, uh Smoke blunts, motherfuckers Uh 9-5, uh Ready to die, motherfuckers Uh Uh
song.verse: I seen the light excite all the freaks Stack mad chips, spread love with my peeps Niggas wanna creep, gotta watch my back Think the Cognac and indo sack make me slack? I switches all that, cocksucker, Clip to TEC, respect, I demand it Slip and break the 11th Commandment Thou shalt not fuck with nor see Poppa Feel a thousand deaths when I drop you I feel for you, like Chaka Khan, I'm the don Pussy when I want, Rolex on the arm You'll die slow but calm Recognize my face so there won't be no mistake So you know where to tell Jake, lame nigga Brave nigga, turned front page nigga flips daily I smoke the blunts he sips on the Baileys On the rocks, tote Glocks at christenings Hammer cock, in the fire position and—
song.interlude: It ain't gotta be like that, B.I.G.Come on, manCome on, manCome on, man Look at you now, huh? Come on, man Can't talk with a gun in your mouth, huh? Bitch-ass nigga, what? Who shot ya?
song.outro:
To give you what you need Get live, motherfuckers Get high, motherfuckers Who shot ya? Ready to die, motherfuckers, hah! As we proceed Who shot ya? To give you what you need East Coast, motherfucker Who shot ya? Uh
